oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Outlaws and Armadillos exhibit opening concert - 2018-05-26
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Concert performance from the CMA Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 26, 2018. Hosted by Peter Cooper and Shooter Jennings. Performers include Bobby Bare, Jessi Colter, Shooter Jennings, Joe Ely, Michael Martin Murphey, Gary P. Nunn, Ray Wiley Hubbard, Waylon Pauyne, Kimmie Rhodes (appearing with Delbert McClinton), Billy Joe Shaver, Bobby Earl Smith, Tanya Tucker, Jason Boland, Jack Ingram, Jason Isbell, Jamey Johnson, Ashley Monroe, Elizabeth Cook, Amanda Shires and Colter Wall. Band leaders Shooter Jenning and Dave Cobb. In conjunction with the opening of the museum’s major exhibition Outlaws & Armadillos: Country’s Roaring ’70s.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bobby Bare; Jessi Colter; Shooter Jennings; Joe Ely; Michael Martin Murphey; Gary P. Nunn; Ray Wiley Hubbard; Waylon Payne; Kimmie Rhodes; Billy Joe Shaver; Bobby Earl Smith; Tanya Tucker; Jason Boland; Jack Ingram; Jason Isbell; Jamey Johnson; Ashley Monroe; Elizabeth Cook; Amanda Shires; Colter Wall; Dave Cobb;
